topics.body:
"@Background Pony #5B67":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536895136368720c53c90000#post_536895136368720c53c90000
[bq="Background Pony #5B67"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536894dd6368722634350000#post_536894dd6368722634350000
It really is!

Science is fucking awesome! Are you a scientist or something by the way?[/bq]
No; it's more of a hobby really.

I'm a artist/advertiser and going into video game making.  My strong suite though is having things stick when it comes to knowledge.  A prime example of this is website development; even though I kind of got into it as a joke and learned java just to do something fancy a four years ago and haven't really used it since I still remember most of the bells and whistles.  In other words: Once I understand something it sticks even after years of not using that knowledge.  My intelligence is normal, rather I don't lose knowledge.

topics.body:
"@Background Pony #5B67":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5368987b63687204523a0000#post_5368987b63687204523a0000
[bq="Background Pony #5B67"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/536897dd63687274283b0000#post_536897dd63687274283b0000
You call that normal Intelligence? You're awesome!

I wish I hade that amount of skill, I cant even remember things I've done five seconds ago.

And also, can I see your art?[/bq]
Well on average it's normal.


I don't have any of my old drawings left.  The reason why is that the last art contest I was in, even though I wasn't the best, the only people that won the contest were "postmodern" "art" pieces and hipsters went around being douchbags to the actual artists.  That wasn't the thing that hurt the most; rather all but one of the judges called the "postmodern" stuff good whereas the other stuff bad and handed out thousands of dollars to only the ones they liked.  I was so upset by this that I switched degrees and next to none of the original pieces remain.

I was going to get back into drawing a week ago, but I'm in the process of moving and well that's been put on hold for another week.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
